{{cleanup-linkrot|date=August 2011}} {{Infobox album | Name = We Have Arrived | Type = studio | Longtype = | Artist = [[Dark Angel (band)|Dark Angel]] | Cover = DARKANGEL-WeHaveArrived.jpg | Released = November 5, 1984 | Recorded = | Genre = [[Thrash metal]], [[speed metal]] | Length = 33:33 | Label = Azra/Metalstorm | Producer = Dark Angel | Last album = | This album = '''''We Have Arrived'''''
(1985) | Next album = ''[[Darkness Descends]]''
(1986) | Misc = {{Extra album cover | Upper caption = Axe Killer re-release cover | Type = studio | Cover = We_Have_Arrived_Cover.jpg | Lower caption = }} }} '''''We Have Arrived''''' is the debut studio album by [[thrash metal]] band, [[Dark Angel (band)|Dark Angel]], released in November 5, 1984. In 1986 it was re-released by the French recording label Axe Killer in a 2,000 number limited edition. It was then re-released once again in 2007 by Axe Killer. The label attached to the plastic wrap says that this is a remastered edition, but there is no indication of it in the booklet.http://www.metal-archives.com ==Reception== {{Album ratings |rev1 = [[Allmusic]] |rev1score = {{Rating|1.5|5}}[{{Allmusic|class=album|id=r34698|pure_url=yes}} Allmusic review] |rev2 = [[Sputnikmusic]] |rev2score = {{Rating|4|5}}[http://www.sputnikmusic.com/album.php?albumid=11151 Sputnikmusic review] |rev3 = [[Metal Storm (webzine)|Metal Storm]] |rev3score = {{Rating|7.3|10}}[http://www.metalstorm.net/pub/review.php?review_id=5747 Metal Storm review] }} The album was met with mixed reactions. Reviewer Eduardo Rivadavia of [[Allmusic]] gave the album a 1.5 of 5 saying "Dark Angel's arrogantly titled debut We Have Arrived is as primitive as it gets." and "The album will only interest serious thrash enthusiasts." An anonymous reviewer from [[Metal Storm]] gave the album a 7.3 of 10 rating saying "It is good, aggressive thrash metal, with rather varied riffs." ==Track listing== {{Track listing | total_length = 33:33 | title1 = We Have Arrived | length1 = 4:07 | title2 = Merciless Death | length2 = 4:28 | title3 = Falling From The Sky | length3 = 4:23 | title4 = Welcome To The Slaughter House | length4 = 5:23 | title5 = No Tomorrow | length5 = 6:31 | title6 = Hell On Its Knees | length6 = 4:14 | title7 = Vendetta | length7 = 4:27 }} ==Personnel== ;Dark Angel *Don Doty - Vocals *[[Eric Meyer (musician)|Eric Meyer]] - Lead guitars *Jim Durkin - Guitars *Rob Yahn - Bass *Jack Schwartz - Drums ;Production *Vadim Rubin - [[Executive producer]] *Mike Siegal - [[Executive producer]] *Bill Metoyer - [[Audio engineering|Engineer]] ==References== {{Reflist}} {{Dark Angel}} {{DEFAULTSORT:We Have Arrived (Album)}} [[Category:Debut albums]] [[Category:Dark Angel (band) albums]] [[Category:1984 albums]] {{Thrash-metal-album-stub}} [[fr:We Have Arrived]] [[it:We Have Arrived]] [[no:We Have Arrived]]
